help-file.title: "ENERGY DRAIN"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: Yes Duration: Permanent Type of spell: Generic
"Energy Drain" literally drains the lifeblood from the victim, as it feeds on the energy of life itself. Although it does not do much damage to the victim, a successful spell cast causes the victim to lose energy, and the caster then gains a fraction of this life force, movement points, and mana.
The gods consider such an act upon another living being extremely evil and casting it will thus affect how evil you are perceived in the world.
